entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the evening then cloudy. Flurries beginning overnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 07 March 2023
